body.name: Napkin Holder for Table, Flat Napkin Holder with Weighted Arm, Napkin Holder, Napkin Dispenser, Modern Flat Napkin Holders, Square Paper Napkin Holders, Napkin Holder for Kitchen (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 18 hrs 52 mins
features: LARGE SIZE for NAPKINS: This novelty square napkin holder measures 7.5 *7.5*2.8'' and is the perfect size to hold dinner or cocktail napkins, coasters, or memos, and also fits other standard guest towel/buffet napkins

WEIGHTED ARM: To keep paper napkins in order, the arm is designed weighted enough to hold down the paper towel, so it's easy to keep napkins in place, you don't need to worry that napkins would be messed up when you take one form this napkin organizer. Easily adjust the weighted pivot arm to keep your paper, cocktail, or cloth napkins secure and organized indoors or outdoors.

STURDY: This napkin basket is high-quality made. Durable construction ensures the black napkin holder will last. The thick-gauge steel wire does not bend easily, and the smooth welds will not puncture or tear paper napkins. Metal construction is heavy-duty and durable

Anti-rust- Enjoy the beautiful matte black finish on your new stainless steel napkin holder designed to stand the test of time. Our high-quality construction ensures no loose, or poorly assembled design elements on this indoor or outdoor napkin holder.

PERFECT for INDOOR or OUTDOOR: The hefty rustic napkin holder holds its own in windy outdoor conditions, making it a perfect addition to a picnic, cookout, barbecue, coffee break, or any other outdoor food gathering. Meanwhile, place this napkin caddy on the dining table, kitchen countertop, picnic blanket, coffee table, home bar, breakfast nook, bathroom, or anywhere.

ELEGANT DESIGN - Our matte black finish and stylish lattice pattern can instantly uplift any dining room table, kitchen counter, bar counter, or any area where family and guests gather to eat and share a meal. A timeless design that fits modern, contemporary, and even rustic or farmhouse spaces.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Zhithink Napkin Holder for Kitchen Dimension: 7.5* 7.5* 2.8inchesDurable & High-Quality Keep Napkins in PlacePerfect addition to a picnic, cookout, barbecue, coffee break, or any other outdoor food gathering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and well built
reviews.reviewText: This fits standard size home dinner napkins. Think "Bounty" and they'll fit just fine. The weighted arm is just heavy enough without being obtrusive. If you have a breeze, your napkins won't go anywhere. I would not expect it to hold up in a hurricane or with a solid 30mph gust. But for your typical day outside, it's just fine. It's made of brushed black metal and feels solid. No complaints at all with this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't hold a lot.
reviews.reviewText: Compared to other paper napkin holders, this doesn't hold a lot. With that said, it works well. Standard sized napkins fit nicely and dispense easily.The dispenser does slide around on the table too easily. I plan to add a stick-on silicone bumper pad to each of he four spherical shaped feet to keep it from moving around. If the dispenser sliding around when being used won't bother you, get it--it works as described otherwise and is nice looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m redoing a lot of much needed work around the kitchen. The picture of the silver vertical holder we’ve had at least 10 years. The majority of our appliances (old and new) are black.I really love this napkin holder, I feel real boujee now. 😊 The color looks great. It should last a long time.Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds napkins well and looks great
reviews.reviewText: I needed something to hold napkins for our get togethers and I decided to give this one a try. This is very attractive napkin holder and works very well. It sits well on the counter and the dinning table. Overall a good buy for the price and I recommended it highly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than stand up holders
reviews.reviewText: I think this is a better napkin holder than the stand up ones, because as you use the napkins, they don't fall out or fold over, so it's easier to get them out of the holder. It's a nice black, and looks great on the kitchen counter.
